snippet: The United States International Trade Commission, in a preliminary ruling, rejected Apple’s digital-camera patent claims against the Eastman Kodak Company.

headline.main: Trade Ruling Favors Kodak in Dispute With Apple
headline.print_headline: Trade Ruling Favors Kodak in Dispute With Apple

snippet: Harmon Killebrew issued a modest farewell on Friday in which the slugger of 573 home runs said his battle against esophageal cancer had come to an end.
abstract: Baseball Hall of Fame player Harmon Killebrew issues modest farewell in which the slugger of 573 home runs says his battle against esophageal cancer has come to an end.

headline.main: An Ailing Killebrew Simply Says Farewell
headline.print_headline: An Ailing Killebrew Simply Says Farewell

snippet: It has been nearly a year since Amazon announced a new Kindle product, but Jeff Bezos, the company’s chief executive, dropped a hint that a “multipurpose tablet device” could be on the way.
abstract: It has been nearly a year since Amazon announced a new Kindle product, but Jeff Bezos, the company’s chief executive, dropped a hint that a “multipurpose tablet device” could be on the way.

headline.main: On the Lookout for an Amazon Tablet

snippet: Netflix’s streaming app is now available for some Android devices, but the fact that only some Android phones get the latest features and others do not is a continuing problem for Google.
abstract: Netflix’s streaming app is now available for some Android devices, but the fact that only some Android phones get the latest features and others do not is a continuing problem for Google.

headline.main: Netflix Is Available for Some Android Devices, but Not All

snippet: Apple and Moses use “Lalo.” Ryder calls Goldie “Glam-Ma.” How about yours?
abstract: Apple and Moses use “Lalo.” Ryder calls Goldie “Glam-Ma.” How about yours?

headline.main: A Grandma by Any Other Name

snippet: Data is a vital raw material of the information economy, but the business world is just beginning to learn how to process it all.

headline.main: New Ways to Exploit Raw Data May Bring Surge of Innovation, a Study Says
headline.print_headline: New Ways to Exploit Raw Data May Bring Surge of Innovation, a Study Says
